name: video-player-monorepo
description: Advanced video player with annotations and chapter navigation

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend-nestjs && npm install
scripts.seed:docker: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend python seed.py
scripts.seed:nestjs: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend-nestjs sh -c 'cd /app && npm run seed'
